tr_welcomeApp: Organized에 오신 것을 환영합니다 – 회중 생활 관리 도구입니다
tr_descApp: 아니요, 공식 앱이 아닙니다. 본인이 적합하다고 판단하신다면 사용해보세요. 전체 회중이 사용하기를 원하신다면 장로회에 승인을 요청하는 것이 좋습니다. 유사한 작업을 돕기 위해 설계된 다른 앱들이 있다는 것을 알고 있으며, 각 앱마다 장점과 방법이 있지만, 모두 동일한 목표를 공유합니다.
tr_appPWA: Organized is a PWA application. What does it mean?
tr_appPWADesc:
As a Progressive Web Application (PWA), Organized operates directly within your web browser. It is designed to function across various operating systems, so it supports both desktop and mobile devices.

Once installed on your device and after completing the initial setup, Organized remains accessible offline, ensuring you can use its main features without an internet connection.
tr_appSecure: How secure is your data when using Organized?
tr_appSecureDesc:
We have added extra security layers to protect your data. In today’s fast-changing tech world, we regularly update Organized to keep it fully secure.

Even though Organized is a web app, your data is first stored right on your device. This means you can access it, even when you’re offline. If you share information with others in your congregation, it’s securely synced through the cloud servers. Plus, we make sure to protect all private data with strong security measures, like double encryption on our servers.
tr_clearBrowserData: Clearing your browser history or cookies will also delete any unsynchronized Organized data. Please ensure your data is synced before doing this.
tr_appPrivacy: How Organized is taking care of your privacy?
tr_appPrivacyDesc:
When you choose to use our Organized app, we only collect essential information like your name and email. Additionally, we gather your device’s IP address and your device’s user agent details to enhance your experience with our app.

Rest assured, we prioritize your privacy. We never allow advertising companies to track you through our services or use your data for targeted ads. Any information you provide in the Organized app remains strictly confidential and is never shared with outside parties.
tr_readComplete: I accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy and consent to the processing of my personal data as described.
tr_accountCreated: Your Organized account has been created. Inform your congregation administrator to give you the necessary permissions and then refresh the page.
tr_unauthorizedRole:
Your account is all set! To access the Organized app, please ask your congregation’s app administrator to give you permissions and refresh the page in 5 minutes.

Elders can contact us at support@organized-app.com if they need assistance.
tr_oauthAccept: By continuing, you accept our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
tr_signInDesc: Choose how you want to log in
tr_emailAuthDesc: Enter your email to get a link for Organized authentication
tr_emailAuthDescComplete: You have successfully logged in with your email. Now you can access the app.
tr_emailAuthSent: Please check your email inbox. If it’s not there, look in your spam folder or request the link again.
tr_accountSetup: To activate the Organized app on this device, enter the invitation code you got from your congregation elders.
tr_illustrationMinistryAssignmentsDescri: View all your upcoming assignments and get notification about new ones. Get new territory from the available list. Submit an auxiliary pioneer application in a few clicks and access pioneer features like a time tracker, and detailed monthly and yearly report.
tr_illustrationMultiPlattformDescription: Use Organized on your desktop computer, laptop, smartphone, or tablet on any of modern operating systems. The app works online, but it is also accessible even when you have no internet connection.
tr_illustrationMeetingSchedulesDescripti: Import meeting plans from jw.org in just a click and auto-fill assignments. Share your list of outgoing speakers and request lists from other congregations to enhance collaboration. Publish schedules for both publishers and midweek students, allowing them to view their assignments.
tr_illustrationSecretaryDescription: Track meeting attendance record for all meetings, both monthly and annually. View publisher reports and easily send all necessary reports directly to your local branch. Receive and review auxiliary pioneer applications.
tr_selectAccount: To start using Organized, choose which option applies to you:
tr_checkInvitationCode: Please double-check the code you provided
tr_congregationCreateLabel: Your congregation isn’t registered in Organized yet?
tr_incompleteCongregationInfo: Please make sure you’ve provided all needed details to set up your congregation
tr_encryptionCodeLostDesc: Enter your congregation’s encryption code to access it
tr_encryptionCodeNotice: Please note and safeguard this key. Losing it could mean the loss of all your congregation’s data.
tr_emailNotSupported: 죄송합니다. 이 이메일은 유효하지 않거나 지원되지 않습니다.
tr_2FAIncorrectDesc: 코드가 잘못되었거나 만료되었을 수 있습니다. 다시 시도해보세요.
tr_unauthorizedAccountDesc: 귀하의 역할을 확인하기 위해 회중 앱 관리자에게 문의한 후 5분 후에 다시 시도해 주세요. 추가 지원이 필요하면 장로가 이메일로 저희에게 연락할 수 있습니다.
tr_noSchedulesYetDesc: 집회 일정이 아직 제공되지 않았습니다. 귀하의 회중 장로에게 일정을 생성하고 앱에 게시해 달라고 요청하세요.
tr_registeringApproved: 장로회에서 이 회중을 Organized에 등록하는 것을 승인했습니다.
tr_testAppWaitForData: Organized를 사용해 보도록 준비하는 중입니다. 잠시만 기다려 주세요...
tr_testAppWelcome: Organized 테스트 모드에 오신 것을 환영합니다!
tr_testAppWelcomeDesc:
이곳은 가상의 회중을 위한 사전 채워진 데이터가 있는 테스트 환경입니다. 일정, 임명, 봉사, 보고서 등의 기능을 탐색해 보세요! 앱을 다시 로드하면 변경 사항이 초기화됩니다.

실제 Organized 앱을 사용하려면 organized-app.com을 브라우저에서 열어 주세요.
tr_congregationExists: 이 회중은 이미 Organized에 존재합니다. 귀하의 회중 관리자에게 필요한 역할을 부여해 달라고 문의하세요.
tr_congregationAccessCodeCreateDesc: 이 액세스 코드는 귀하의 공유 회중 데이터를 안전하게 암호화합니다. 여기에는 전도인 보고와 일정이 포함됩니다.
tr_congregationAccessCodeNotice: 이 코드를 기록하고 보호하세요. 귀하의 회중에 접근하는 모든 사용자는 Organized 앱을 사용하기 위해 이 코드가 필요합니다.
tr_congregationAccessCodeLostDesc: 귀하의 회중에 대한 액세스 코드를 입력해 주세요. 이 고유 코드는 귀하의 회중에만 사용할 수 있으며 연결 및 접근에 사용됩니다.
tr_congregationMasterKeyLostDesc: 접근하기 위해 귀하의 회중 마스터 키를 입력하세요.
tr_cantFindCongregationDesc: Check for mistakes (minimum input is 2 characters). If your congregation isn’t listed on the jw.org search page, contact support@organized-app.com for help.
tr_appIntro: Organized is an unofficial app for Jehovah's Witnesses created by enthusiastic brothers and sisters. It simplifies various responsibilities in congregation. Please get approval from your body of elders before registering your congregation.
tr_privacySecurityDesc:
Organized is created with privacy and data security as top priority. Full details are provided in our Terms of use and Privacy policy. Here is a brief overview of our data storage and security approach:

  • Local storage, cloud sync: Your data is stored locally on your device for strong security and offline access. If elders enable synchronization, it is protected with end-to-end encryption on our secure cloud servers..
  • Data security: We use advanced security measures like encryption and in-app protections to keep your data safe. We also follow GDPR rules, including using EU-based servers and collecting user data only after consent, with options to request, update, or delete it.
  • Data collection: We collect only basic details – name, email, IP address, and device info – for login, security, and app functionality. We cannot access your data inside the app; all information there is entered only by elders or authorized brothers in your congregation.
  • We never share your data: Your data belongs only to you, and we never share it with any third-party companies for marketing or advertising purposes.
tr_dataManagementDesc: You can access, correct, delete, or export your data in your profile settings or by contacting us at support@organized-app.com. You can withdraw your consent anytime by deleting your account. Organized only collects data and cookies essential for app functionality. Data entered by your congregation’s elders is not managed by us. Your data (name, email, IP, device ID) is kept only as long as needed for app use, until your account is deleted, or as required by law.
tr_mfaVerifyTitle: Let’s make sure it is you
tr_mfaVerifyDesc: Enter a code from your authenticator app
